Man loses legal bid to reclaim $45k diamond engagement ring after split with fianceé https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-loses-legal-bid-to-reclaim-45k-diamond-engagement-ring-after-split-with-fiancee/DJTQ3WNGLZESLOILCZDWY32DXE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-loses-legal-bid-to-reclaim-45k-diamond-engagement-ring-after-split-with-fiancee/DJTQ3WNGLZESLOILCZDWY32DXE/ Jeremy WilkinsonHe wanted the ring back to restore him to his previous financial position. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 05:27:36 +0000 The man sued his ex-fiance for the three-stone diamond engagement ring he gave her before their split, which he claimed he paid $45,000 for. The ring was not the one pictured here designed by Cristina Figursky. Photo / Supplied
